mapper.insert: insert into message value ( null, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, now(), null );
mapper.select: select m.id, u.profile_image as profileImage, u.nickname, m.content, m.createdat as createdAt, m.read_at as readAt from message as m join user as u where m.sender_id = u.id and m.receiver_id = #{userId};
